    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerHandler

        protected ServerHandler(Dictionary dictionary,
                        Deduplicator deduplicator,
                        io.netty.util.Timer timer,
                        SecretProvider secretProvider,
                        java.lang.Class<T> packetClass)
        Parameters:
        dictionary - for encoding/decoding RadiusPackets
        deduplicator - handle duplicate client requests
        timer - handle timeouts if requests take too long to be processed
        secretProvider - lookup sharedSecret given remote address
        packetClass - restrict RadiusPacket subtypes that can be processed by handler, otherwise will be dropped. If all types of RadiusPackets are allowed, use RadiusPacket

    • Method Detail

      • makeDatagramPacket

        protected io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket makeDatagramPacket(RadiusPacket packet,
                                                                    java.lang.String secret,
                                                                    java.net.InetSocketAddress address,
                                                                    RadiusPacket request)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                    RadiusException
        Creates a Radius clientResponse datagram packet from a RadiusPacket to be send.
        Parameters:
        packet - RadiusPacket
        secret - shared secret to encode packet
        address - where to send the packet
        request - clientRequest packet
        Returns:
        new datagram packet
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IO error
        RadiusException - packet malformed

      • makeRadiusPacket

        protected RadiusPacket makeRadiusPacket(io.netty.channel.socket.DatagramPacket packet,
                                        java.lang.String sharedSecret)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        RadiusException
        Creates a RadiusPacket for a Radius clientRequest from a received datagram packet.
        Parameters:
        packet - received datagram
        sharedSecret - to decode datagram
        Returns:
        RadiusPacket object
        Throws:
        RadiusException - malformed packet
        java.io.IOException - communication error

      • handlePacket

        protected abstract io.netty.util.concurrent.Promise<RadiusPacket> handlePacket(io.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                                               T request,
                                                                               java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress,
                                                                               java.lang.String sharedSecret)
        Handles the received Radius packet and constructs a clientResponse.
        Parameters:
        channel - socket which received packet
        request - the packet
        remoteAddress - remote address the packet was sent by
        sharedSecret - shared secret associated with remoteAddress
        Returns:
        Promise of RadiusPacket or null for no clientResponse. Uses Promise instead Future, to allow requests to be timed out or cancelled by the caller
